explains: n. 糖浆；糖水（有时加果汁）；药用糖浆，糖浆剂；（风格，态度）过分甜蜜，过分多愁善感；<英，非正式>假发
wordGroup: cough syrup 止咳糖浆；咳嗽糖浆
maple syrup n. 枫蜜；糖枫汁

sentences.en: Maple syrup is made from sap extracted from the sugar maple tree.
sentences.cn: 槭糖浆是用糖槭树中提取的树液制成的。

sentences.en: After almost a month we get such syrup.
sentences.cn: 大概一个月后，我们会得到这样的糖浆。

sentences.en: Next, add the peanut butter and corn syrup.
sentences.cn: 接下来，加入花生酱和玉米糖浆。
